SEARCH
Package cz.cuni.mff.java.graphs

Class Graph

java.lang.Object
cz.cuni.mff.java.graphs.Graph
All Implemented Interfaces:
Cloneable, Iterable<Vertex>
public class Graph extends Object implements Iterable<Vertex>, Cloneable
Class holding data for the graph and all methods on graphs. Such as building the graph, removing parts, contracting edges and exporting and importing the graph. This class implements Iterable, so it can be iterated through its vertices.

      public Vertex addVertex(double value, int id)
      Add vertex to the graph.
      Parameters:
      value - Is the value of the vertex.
      id - Is the id of the new vertex. If it is not sequent add it in between or make all pre-vertices.
      Returns:
      Newly constructed Vector.

    • addEdge

      public Edge addEdge(double value, int from, int to, int id)
      Add edge to the graph.
      Parameters:
      value - Is the value of the edge.
      from - Is the id of the vertex where the edge is starting.
      to - Is the id of the vertex where the edge is ending.
      id - Is the id of the edge. Has to be one more than the number of vertices.
      Returns:
      Newly constructed edge.

    • addEdge

    • exportMermaid

      public void exportMermaid(BufferedWriter out, boolean markdown, boolean[] dottedEdges) throws IOException
      Export graph as a mermaid diagram to a BuffereWriter.
      Parameters:
      out - Is the output writer which is used for the export.
      markdown - Is boolean if the code header and footer should be added.
      dottedEdges - Is a list of edges, that are dotted.
      Throws:
      IOException - If the given writer will not work properly.

      Parameters:
      filePath - Which file should be used for export.
      append - If the text should be appended to the file or overwrite the file.
      idDotted - Which edge should be dotted.
